From the brand

In the spring of 2018, with enthusiasm for digital products, a group of young people came together and found Andobil to help others enjoy Tech better.Staying curious and creative, we are always determined to combine minimalism with aesthetics to create products.Helping customers to enjoy the ultimate tech is our eternal pursuit.

ãPhone’s Safe Like in an Infant SeatãThis car phone holder with anti-scratched plate and soft rubber side pad design give your iPhone 13 iPhone 12 11 or Samsung 100% protection, makes your cell phones always sleep like a baby in the vent phone mount when driving. Secure air-bag design of this phone holder for car vent leaves zero scratches on your mobile phone even on bumpy roads.
ã0.1s Quick Release One Hand Operationã andobil car phone holder. More convenient and easier operation with new “Quick Release” button, comparing with other “One-hand operation” car phone mount, Andobil phone holder for car vent brings you brand new 0.1s-releasing experience. What’s more, the andobil car phone holder can withstand 300,000+ times open & close by repeated tests in Andobil laboratory.
ã360Â° Flexible Rotation as Wishã Best viewing angle when driving with this air vent car phone mount, it is designed with a 360Â° swivel ball joint, you can adjust your phone with a single hand for a horizontal, vertical, or more layout for navigating, phone talking, music listening, etc. Optimizing the perfect angle & position and offering safe driving experience.
ãWide Compatible with All Smartphonesã This andobil car cell phone holder is compatible with all cell phones from 4″ to 7″, the specially designed adjustable foot can be adjusted for different sizes and shapes, perfect for Apple iPhone 13 pro max, iPhone 13, iPhone 13, iPhone 12 pro max, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 11, X, XR, SE, 7, 6, Samsung Galaxy S21, S20, S10, Note 10, Moto G, Google Pixel, Huawei P30, Nokia, Xiaomi, OnePlus, Sony, LG, etc.
ãAndobil Car Phone Holder Serviceã Andobil is professional in designing and always making the best car phone holder for all the car drivers, including Uber, Lyft, Truck drivers, etc. what’s more, we will provide 2-year support. If you meet any questions or hesitations before purchasing or when using, please let us know, we would like to hear your voice and solve them for you in 12 hours.

Pleasant to hold â our original foam handset cover provides a soft non-slip surface & comfy hold for those with grip impairments such as arthritic hands. The ideal landline phones for seniors.
Never miss a call – extra loud phone (80 dB+) with ringer and handset volume control. Flashing light indicates incoming calls. Great amplified phones for hearing impaired seniors.
Make calls fast – use memory keys to easily call loved ones or emergency SOS number. Security for seniors who have dementia. The big number buttons are great for visually impaired elderly.
Keep it simple – memory keys are straightforward to program and easy to use; dial telephone number with one touch. Our best landline phone for seniors and top in dementia products.

Product Description

Great For Garden Use

For gardeners, plants and vegetables are very important to them.

Especially during bad weather with strong wind and snow, you should need garden fabric (such as row cover or plant cover, or shade cloth), but the good garden clips are also a necessary part of your garden, they can fix the garden fabric in place to extend the growing season.

Beside garden clips, they also can be great food bag closure clips, clothespins, binder clips, photo clips, beach towel clips, etc.

We are sure they will become ideal accessories for you.

About Samhopo

Samhopo means “hopes”, which is also the name of a remote village.

The founder is coming from this very poor and backward place. She is eager to do something to help the people get out of there and have a better life, so there is “Samhopo”

The purpose of the brand is to sell affordable products all around the world to help people live more conveniently.

Large Open Heavy Duty Greenhouse Clips

Length:approx. 2 inch

Width: approx. 1.1 inch

Single clip weight: approx. 0.2 ounce

Package includes:40 x Greenhouse Clips

Have a strong grip Good spring action Sturdy and durable. Smooth edges Easy to Use

MULTI-USE Garden Clips

They will be helpful to anyone who wants them for garden use

Suitable for many hoops of different thickness.

Diameter in closed state approx 3/8â

Maximum diameter in open state approx 3/4â

can be adapted to many different sizes of poles,hoops,stands or pipes.

Why choose our Greenhouse Clamps

GOOD SPRING ACTION: Samhopo garden clips has a thick spring, which has good spring action and can be adapted to most different sizes of garden hoops, stands, pipe or poles. Easy to open and strong. These greenhouse clamps have a strong grip and will not disintegrate like plastic.
MULTI-USE PRODUCT: These greenhouse clips are strong enough to hold down the netting on your raised garden beds or row cover on your garden hoops when it’s a windy day. They will be helpful to anyone who wants them for garden use. Aside from garden use, they make great food bag closure clips, clothespins, binder clips, photo clips, cord clips for hanging up string lights, etc.
SUITABLE FOR MANY HOOPS OF DIFFERENT THICKNESSES: These garden clips have good spring action and strong grip, Diameter in closed state approx 0.36 inches, Maximum diameter in open state approx 0.8 inches, Can be adapted to many different sizes of greenhouse hoops, poles, pipe or stands.
DURABLE MATERIAL: These greenhouse clamps are made of stainless steel(Note: The spring part is not stainless steel), sturdy and durable. They are more durable than wood clips or plastic clips. The clips snapped on easily and held the frost blankets and greenhouse cover in place through high winds and heavy snow.
PACKAGE INCLUDES: 40pcs stainless steel greenhouse clips. Size of the clamp: Length approx. 2 inches, Width approx. 1.1 inches, Single clip weight 0.2 ounce. Please be concerned about the size before you buy.

With Nerf sports toys, you can play your favorite games with your own rules! The Nerf brand makes it fun and easy for everyone to play together, with foam balls that are easy to hold, throw, and catch. The Nerf Sports Pro Grip football is a classic foam ball that has an easy-grip design and is made of semi-soft foam, so you can play with it anyplace, inside or outside. Practice throwing spirals with the Nerf Pro Grip ball, and launch into a game almost anywhere, anytime! Nerf and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.
DURABLE DESIGN FOR OUTDOOR AND INDOOR PLAY: This durable foam ball is made for outdoor and indoor play, so kids can get up and get active inside or outside
